name: Cucumber Lime Mint Agua Fresca
description: Cool and refreshing agua fresca made with cucumbers, lime, and mint.

ingredients.ingredient: cucumbers (ends trimmed, but peel still on, coarsely chopped)
packed (spearmint) mint leaves, woody stems removed

directions: Put the ingredients in a blender and add enough water to fill 3/4 of the blender. Hold the lid on the blender and purée until smooth.
Place a fine mesh sieve over a bowl and pour the purée through it, pressing against the sieve with a rubber spatula or the back of a spoon to extract as much liquid out as possible.
Fill a large pitcher halfway with ice cubes. Add the juice. Serve with sprigs of mint and slices of lime.
